Pouvez-vous m'aider 
URGENT 
Merci

Posts.EditableText:
It looks like `game.pov.parent` is null.

So you've moved the player outside of any room. This could be by moving them to an underfined location, using `RemoveObject` on the current player object, or moving them outside of any room in the editor.
Posts.HTML:
It looks like game.pov.parent is null.

So you've moved the player outside of any room. This could be by moving them to an underfined location, using RemoveObject on the current player object, or moving them outside of any room in the editor.
